message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"to think or to feel (about something)","sentence":"我觉得好。","image_prompt":"A young person is standing in a soft-apocalypse animated environment, with faint, mystical ruins in the background and soft, dreamy lighting. The person has a thoughtful expression, with one finger on their chin, and a faint thought bubble above their head containing a bright 'good' character (好) inside it. The mood is gentle and contemplative, in a pastel color palette.","sentence_translation":"I think (it is) good."}
